original_title: The Laughter & Secrets of 'Love Actually': 20 Years Later
overview: ABC News anchor Diane Sawyer marks the 20th anniversary of the making of the holiday classic movie “Love Actually” in this primetime special. Featuring interviews with the cast and crew, the special looks at how the film became a beloved Christmas tradition and a global sensation, with new insight into behind-the-scenes secrets and iconic scenes.
title: The Laughter & Secrets of 'Love Actually': 20 Years Later
